attributes.action: Provide an alternative insurance scheme for young people
attributes.additional_details:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Getting the first car has not been a pleasent experience for my generation. We have been burdened with rising oil prices, insurance schemes based on unethical data-mining and iron-fisted traffic control.

I request that measures are taken to determine whether insurance companies are obeying the laws entirely with their schemes and that any using statistics gathered from traffic-accidents are forcibly dismantled for basic ethical reasons.
